website_summaries.verdict: Why take up extra space in your garage, when you can save money by bolting these sturdy and vibrantly colored high-performance skis to the kick scooter you already have?
pros: Kit easily turns any kick scooter into a snow scooter
cons: With a weight limit of 220 pounds, adults will want a turn, too

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun, we live in MN so this will get a lot of good use. Cannot speak of the durability as we have only used them for 2 weeks. I was a little Leary of how the plastic would handle the cold but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son took off his wheels from his pro scooter and easily transformed it into snow scooter. His friends were all super impressed with it. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Install easily, and slide better than i thought they would on snow
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my Nephews and they love them. It took just a couple minutes to swap out the wheels on their scooters for these skis. They track well. They slide well on snow. The skis appear to be quite durable.
customer_reviews.author: Grimm Hippopotamus

customer_reviews.title: Great idea and great product
customer_reviews.text: The skies are perfect. We used them on the scooter and they worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to switch out
customer_reviews.text: Loved being able to turn my son's old scooter into a ski scooter!
customer_reviews.author: recoveringshopaholic

customer_reviews.title: yeah !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We finally got snow not that much though but my grandson had so much fun !!!!! He loves it !!!!
customer_reviews.author: scibberas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely LOVES that he can ride his acooter in the snow. Easy to switch between the skis and wheel. One of his top presents he got for Christmas :)
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: So much Fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is a scooter freak. This was just what he needed for the winter. Snow Scooter riding.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun! This is a must in the snow.
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter loves these. They fit perfect on a razor and are so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: ashley c bunting

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy for my son (11) to take on and off by himself. They are sturdy and a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Kids enjoyed these on their scooter much more than using traditional skies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My son enjoyed them, he is 13 and we live in Minnesota , lots of snow. fun little things.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My young neighbor loved them!!! He said they were awesome.☺
customer_reviews.author: Becky  J Dachsteiner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked better than I though and going to buy 2 more sets soon
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Converted out regular scooter quickly!
customer_reviews.text: We converted our girls wheeled scooter for some downhill winter fun. I was surprised how well these worked and they don't go too fast since the skis are short. We could only get the skateboard conversion so after a great time trying them out we are selling the second set for someone else to have some fun with!
customer_reviews.author: wahoobie

customer_reviews.title: easy and fun
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my scooter crazy son and he loved it. took a couple of minutes to install...headed to the ski hill and he was a hit. Love the fact that it has a brake.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son for Christmas. Great product, well made!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Railz Original Snow Sled Ski Scooter Kit for All Ages. Designed & Patented in The USA. Turn Your Favorite Street Kick Skooter into a Snow Scooter.
feature_bullets: RAILZ Next-Gen Pro-66 Patented Super Hi-Performance Heavy Duty Skis and Snow-Brake Combo.
Turn your favorite Kick Scooter into a Snow Scooter. Replace the wheels on your kick scooter and turn it into a high performance SnowScooter
Kit includes 2 RAILZ Next-Gen Pro-66 skis, with integrated Sure Stop snow-brake, tools & Free RAILZ logo sticker. All ages.
Don't forget to order a Railz Safety Leash and Railz Stainless Steel Rail Kit for better performance and to meet ski resort requirements.
100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: If you are not completely satisfied simply return within 30 days for a full refund! Buy with confidence.
